Home → Mobile libraries and home library service → Ipswich Mobile Library Route 12

Ipswich Mobile Library Route 12

Ipswich Mobile Library Route 12 is off the road today (Thursday 5 September) due to repairs.

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Route 12 Town/Village Location Time
12A Westerfield Swan 0925 – 0940
12B Witnesham Weyland Road 0950 – 1020
12C Swilland Moon and Mushroom 1025 – 1040
12D Swilland Sunset Cottage 1045 – 1055
12E Rushmere St Andrew Village Hall 1120 – 1140
12F Rushmere St Andrew Chestnut Close 1145 – 1215
12G Rushmere St Andrew Meadowside Gardens 1220 – 1240
12H Playford Phone box 1350 – 1405
12I Great Bealings Boot Street 1415 – 1430
12J Little Bealings Admiral’s Head 1435 – 1500
12K Waldringfield Village Way 1515 – 1550
12L Newbourne Fox 1600 – 1630

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays:

2019: 24 January, 21 February, 21 March, 18 April, 16 May, 13 June, 11 July, 8 August, 5 September, 3 October, 31 October, 28 November, no visit in December

2019 23 January
